p: Finally, the estimates revealed that the ORR process uses roughly four electrons, except in the case of Pt/C. This behavior of PdNi/C electrocatalysts reveals that hydrogen peroxide production is reduced at about 4 electrons mechanism. The large creation of hydrogen peroxides at Pt/C is due to the fact that the ORR in alkaline occurs via two-electron pathway [ 39]. In the literature, two-electron pathway of Pt/C (Pt, 20% weight ratio) for ORR have been reported [ 42].
